text:
These are the nurses, doctors, EMTs, and more on the frontlines fighting coronavirus.

Democrats are working hard to ensure hospitals and healthcare providers have the resources they need to save lives.

Senator McConnell’s plan doesn’t give them a dime.

https://t.co/0L6MUnnVVu
